name: 别动这个方块
description:
别动这个方块(Don't move the block) is a pixel style horizontal jumping game.

In the game, you will meet blocks of different colors, their characteristics are the key to passing the game;
And your only ability is to jump,
Among them, you will meet various other blocks, understand their characteristics, and pass levels;


Sorry, this is my first game development, and some inexplicable bugs will inevitably appear
The music and art are not satisfactory, this is the most annoying place, so it is recommended to buy carefully.
If you find anything, please send it to 2634673912@qq.com.

If you are unsatisfied, please point out its shortcomings and deficiencies, and refund immediately.
I promise that there will be updates to the next 25 levels, but it may be a year later. . .
Because I am about to end my university life, I will be busy for a long time.

As you can see, this game has many shortcomings, thank you again for your purchase.
:)
